questions.quote: I made her. Steel drums don't really say "elegant wedding". Nor does Marjorie's overwhelming scent.
Right. Are you looking for Jack's parents to discuss the problems he's having with Ben? Yeah. Because I really do think the parents should sit down and have a conversation.
If you never smoke again I'll give you seven thousand dollars!
No, but, but I wanna be with you in spite of all those things.
What are you doing? Get back over on your side of the... Hello!! Hi, I'm Joey, we haven't met.
Alright, we don't know that it's him. I mean, it could be the football guy.
I'm afraid the situation is much worse than we expected. Your sister is suffering from a..subcranial hematoma. Perhaps we can discuss this over coffee.
Wait a minute, the house was built on radioactive waste, and an ancient Indian burial ground? That would never happen.
Are you kidding? Okay, I'll give you a hint; I'll give you a hint.
Y'know, of all my friends, no-one knows the crap I go through with my mom more than you.
